text: The Great Awakening is the fourth studio album from the Christian rock band Leeland, released on September 20, 2011. The Great Awakening received a nomination to the 54th Grammy Awards for Best Contemporary Christian Music Album.Nominees And Winners | GRAMMY.com ==Track listing== ==Singles== *"The Great Awakening" *"I Wonder" *"Pages" ==References== Category:2011 albums Category:Leeland (band) albums
title: The Great Awakening
